query.statement:
SELECT H.PSPID ,A.ZSITE_NM ,(A.ADDR1 || ' ' || A.ADDR2) AS SITE_ADDR ,H.USE_DAT ,H.BIGO ,H.CHGNO ,H.SEND_DAT ,F.USERNAME AS REQ_MAN ,H.REQ_DAT ,(SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = H.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = H.LIFNR) AS NAME1 , CASE WHEN H.LIFNR ='5158122335' AND H.STATE = 'B' THEN '¼Û¹Î¿í»ç¿ø' WHEN H.LIFNR ='1278167377' AND H.STATE = 'B' THEN '¹ÚÁ¤ÈÆ»ç¿ø' ELSE '' END LIFNR_NM , CASE WHEN H.LIFNR ='5158122335' AND H.STATE = 'B' THEN '010-3027-6684' WHEN H.LIFNR ='1278167377' AND H.STATE = 'B' THEN '010-4948-1644 ' ELSE '' END LINFNR_TEL , A.POSID , A.G_ADDR , A.G_MEMO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTHOOKM AS H INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A ON A.MANDT = H.MANDT AND A.POSID = H.PSPID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS F ON H.MANDT = F.MANDT AND H.REQ_MAN = F.USERNUMB
WHERE H.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND H.PSPID = #PSPID# AND H.REQ_DAT = #REQ_DAT# AND H.CHGNO = #CHGNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
